price: Uwo wese rero yishe n’ibigira nkana umwemeramana ata kibimurekurira, azohanishwa umuriro wa Jahannamu awubemwo ibihe bidahera [95], ugushavurirwa n’Imana Allah, hamwe rero no kuvumwa akiri kw’isi, vyongeye Imana Allah Yaranamutegekanirije n’ibindi bihano bihambaye.
arabic: وَمَن يَقۡتُلۡ مُؤۡمِنٗا مُّتَعَمِّدٗا فَجَزَآؤُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُ خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَا وَغَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَلَعَنَهُۥ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُۥ عَذَابًا عَظِيمٗا
footnotes: [95] Kiretse mu gihe yokwigaya ukuri kw’ukwigaya atarapfa, kandi Imana Allah ntizohanisha ibigaba mu bemeramana umuriro wa Jahannamu ngo bawubemwo ibihe bidahera, ariko Izowubahanisha hanyuma ku mpuhwe zayo Iheze Ibatezurire.

meta.transliteration: waman yaqtul mu'minan mutaʿammidan fajazāuhu jahannamu khālidan fīhā waghaḍiba al-lahu ʿalayhi walaʿanahu wa-aʿadda lahu ʿadhāban ʿaẓīman
